title: Imprint & Privacy Policy
subtitle: Information about the provider, disclaimer, and the processing of personal data.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.body: Es gibt keinen Text, den ich übersetzen kann. Bitte geben Sie den Text ein, den Sie übersetzt haben möchten.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We take the protection of your personal data seriously. Below, we inform you about the processing of personal data when using this application.
privacy.sections: I'm sorry, it seems there is no text provided. Could you please provide the text you need to be translated into English?
